title: Data Types
subtext: Categories defining the kind of data variables can hold.
author: Buzzpy

description.title: Data Types
texts: Data types define the kind of data a variable can hold. Common data types include integers (whole numbers), floats (decimal numbers), strings (text), and booleans (true or false).
Think of data types like different kinds of containers: a jar for jam, a box for toys, or a bottle for water.
